Singer: The Voidz

Record Company: Cult Records

item.title: Research_lab_works
item.description:
CREPE: Open-Domain Question Answering with False Presuppositions

ğŸ¯ Target

The authors introduced CREPE, a QA dataset containing a natural distribution of presupposition failures from online information-seeking forums.

ğŸ“¦ Dataset

CREPE, a QA dataset containing a natural distribution of presupposition failures from online information-seeking forums.
Data Source: Reddit, the ELI5 subreddit.
Data Numbers: 8,400 Reddit questions with:

  1. Labels (whether there are any false presuppositions).
  2. The false presuppositions and their corrections, if there are any false presuppositions in questions.

item.title: DP_Question
item.description:
Preface

Because I always hit a wall with Dynamic Programming problems, I would like to summarize the solution to Dynamic Programming problems(DP).

Basic solution to DP problemsï¼š

  • Initial State
  • State Transition Equation

1. Linear DP

1. 1 Exampleï¼šLeetcode 300. Longest Increasing Subsequence
Given an integer array nums, return the length of the longest strictly increasing subsequence.

Example 1:

Input: nums = [10, 9, 2, 5, 3, 7, 101, 18]
Output: 4
Explanation: The longest increasing subsequence is [2, 3, 7, 101], therefore the length is 4.

item.title: Markdown Study Notes
item.description:
Preface

This article mainly summarizes the common syntax of Markdown, so that you can write Markdown files better by yourself.

1. Basic Grammer

1.1 Title

Use# to create a title. The number of # you use indicates the number of heading levels.

Markdown Display
# title1

title1
# title2

title2
# title3

title3

1.2 Line break

Add 2 or more spaces after the text, or add a blank line (press enter twice).

item.title: Hugo_githubpages
item.description:
1. Preface

Originally, I was required to create a web service for a research project, but I accidentally discovered Hugo. So I took this opportunity to use Hugo to make my blog. This article mainly covers the process of setting up a personal blog, some of the problems I encountered and the solutions, I hope it will be helpful to you.

Since I am using mac os, there may be some differences from the Windows system.
